roleset.name: utter memorized passage
roleset.note: RECITE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls performance-26.7-1-1, transfer_mesg-37.1.1. (from recite.01-v)
RECITAL-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to recite.01-v. Recite.01 is a member of VN classes performance-26.7-1-1 andtransfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Katie. (from recital.01-n)

roles.note: This is not limited to voicing of memorized passages, but includes any memorized performance, such as insturmental recitals (from recital.01-n)

example.name: pretty basic
example.text: Besides *trace*-1 reciting the pardon for program trading contained in the Brady Commission report, they-1 said stock-index arbitrage was actually needed Monday to restore the markets' equilibrium.
example.arg: the pardon for program trading contained in the Brady Commission report

example.name: With audience
example.text: Then, he-1 refused *PRO*-1 to show us the decision of the committee and recited its results to us.

example.name: LBV
example.text: Later this season, he gives a Bach recital at Washington's Kennedy Center.
